resources.string: An error has occurred. Check the logs to know more.
There are no tracks in pool, please download the track pool first

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean et est a dui semper facilisis. Pellentesque placerat elit a nunc. Nullam tortor odio, rutrum quis, egestas ut, posuere sed, felis. Vestibulum placerat feugiat nisl. Suspendisse lacinia, odio non feugiat vestibulum, sem erat blandit metus, ac nonummy magna odio pharetra felis. Vivamus vehicula velit non metus faucibus auctor.
Our recommender system is based on similarity of audio feature values such as Acousticness, Tempo etc. of tracks to user\'s favourite music
Contains your favourite tracks and artist visualized
Displays output of powerful Spotify recommender system. System is able to recommend based on various seeds that can be customized.
You can create custom playlist based on your current taste in an interactive tool and save it to your Spotify.

This is our custom recommender system. 

 Firstly the pool of candidate tracks is collected based on user's music (relations between artists and top tracks for the artist are utilized), subsequently "best" based on the audio features are selected. 

 Overall - candidates are ranked based on comparison with all user's tracks 

 Specific- candidates are ranked based on comparison with the small number af most similar to that track 

 Custom - weight of each audio feature as well as the number of tracks relevant for comparison can be customized

Contains: 

 Top Tracks - user's top tracks calculated by Spotify 

 Top Artists - user's top artists calculated by Spotify 

 Saved tracks - tracks saved by user in Spotify library

Recommendations by Spotify based on various types of seeds: 

 By Tracks - top 5 tracks are taken as seeds 

 By Artists - top 5 artists are taken as seeds 

 By Genres - top 5 genres are calculated from user's music 

 Combined - user can select seeds from tracks, artists, genres in any combination

Playlist creation tool. 

 Application offers tracks based on user's music and realtime feedback (positive, neutral or negative). 

 User can save created playlist to Spotify app.
Absolute - actual value mapped to interval 0\-100.\n\nRelative - value relative to average from "random" set of tracks, mapped to interval 0\-100
Set weight for each audio feature type.\nWeight set to 0 means that audio feature is not taken into consideration for selection of the tracks
Something went wrong. Check your connection and try again.
